occupation: COO Signifi at Signifi Solutions Inc.
headline: COO at Signifi Solutions Inc.
summary: I am a technically sophisticated and business savvy professional with a pioneering career reflecting strong lT leadership qualifications, successful business system and technical process improvement and extensive program management leveraging multiple processes and methods in diverse environments, technologies and business entities.

experiences.title: COO Signifi
experiences.description:
Oversight and enhanced the PMO, Customer Support, Parts Management, Production, Logistics, Quality Assurance and Engineering teams in the synergies, development, construction and delivery of automated Retail Vending, BOPIS and Asset Management integrated hardware & software solutions. Team size of 60.
Implemented improvements in operational cadence, standards, training and ITIL best practices for quality and integrated tactical strengths as part of solution architecture, delivery and support for ODOO ERP/CRM deployment

experiences.title: Project Manager and process architecture (Global Sales Realignment User Journey Ideation
experiences.description: Led a solutions team on customer user journey program reviews, innovation and improvements strategies for sales portfolios, offerings, marketing, investment and synergies for global sales alignment.

experiences.title: Program Management (Azure and AWS Cloud Migrations)
experiences.description: Worked with team of project managers on the evacuation and migration of all customer and internal Fujitsu data center assets in Dallas and Sunnyvale to Azure, AWS or other third party dispositions or to OCI performed by a separate Fujitsu teams

experiences.title: Project Manager (Glovia OMS Implementations) (Fujitsu Project)
experiences.description: Project manager for the integration and customization of the Glovia order management enterprise suite integrated and built on the Salesforce platform at two concurrent projects at the Royal Canin and Roche Diagnostics US head offices.

experiences.title: Bruce Power Application Modernization Project Manager (Fujitsu Project)
experiences.description: Project manager for the architecture and application modernization of a portfolio of Bruce Power critical operation applications involving security, radiation monitoring, control and exposure assessment, reporting and maintenance of compliance systems for critical nuclear site equipment processes and controls.

experiences.title: OPG Application Modernization Project Manager (Fujitsu Project)
experiences.description:
•	Engaged with OPG managing and assisting in the business requirements and systems/security architecture reengineering utilizing web services and NetScaler load management of a critical power supply order management interface application utilized by the Independent Electrical Systems Operators (IESO).
•	Also managed a parallel project for the functional/technical requirements of the current Resource Outage Management system used at OPG to compile a detailed COTS RFP replacement for commercial vendor tender, response, selection and implementation management.

experiences.title: Project Manager/Business Analyst and SOC Compliance Lead (Fujitsu Project)
experiences.description: •	Performing PM and Functional lead, testing and training roles on a migration project to upgrade the existing Microsoft TFS development environment to the Microsoft VSTS cloud hosted Azure solution.

experiences.title: Ryerson University DMZ Innovation Immersion Project Manager (Fujitsu Project)
experiences.description:
Worked with approved Fujitsu investment funding to partner with the Ryerson University DMZ start-up incubator on an Innovation Immersion program.
•	The goal was to propose business challenges and evaluate presentation by potential start-up companies for innovative digital proposals from which we can partner and build commercial offerings.

experiences.title: Service Delivery Manager (North America and Global Governance)  (Fujitsu Project)
experiences.description:
•	Performing SDM management within ITIL framework to support Brookfield Corporate Operations (BCO) and Brookfield Investment Management (BIM) for all North American locations with coordination in Australia/UK
•	Performing all aspects of service delivery including client executive program reporting, compliance reviews, support level management, continuous improvement and process reviews, major incident management, root cause analysis reviews and reporting and change advisory board reviews
•	Evaluated scope, documented operations and technical processes, managing knowledge transfer and transition of infrastructure, application and supplier support services to Fujitsu distributed support towers for BIM
•	Support includes all aspects of servers, systems, networks, applications and project infrastructure 
•	Distributed support team and development teams of  150 + resource, $60 Million, 3 year budget

experiences.title: Service Delivery Manager and 3rd Party Contracts Manager (Fujitsu Project)
experiences.description:
•	Work with Brookfield management to evaluate, coordinate the operationally management or transition support functions of 180+ global 3rd party suppliers and their contracts to Fujitsu distributed support towers
•	Developed ITIL operational procedures and standards for management, SLA compliance and delivery 
•	Team of 3 resources, member of an  $60 million, 3 year outsource engagement

experiences.title: Consulting Manager
experiences.description:
CGI Group Inc. 							  Jul 2004 – Feb 2006
Program Manager/ PMO Manager (Services to Bell Canada)	
•	Managed matrix resources for CGI on support and development SLA projects with Bell Canada
•	Led project releases to enhance the retail portal systems (Iris) for purchase, ordering, scheduling, accounting and marketing systems on behalf of 1500+ BellWorld stores aligned to CGI CPMF requirements
•	Managed Bell ExpressVu  programs for VoIP, IPTV, accounting compliance (Sarbanes –Oxley), and an Agile BEA Web Logic SOA foundation architecture rewrite to simplify installation service and order integration

experiences.title: Service Delivery and Support/Development Manager
experiences.description:

•	Managed transition activities for services, vendors, application and infrastructure support as required

recommendations:
Si Bartlett



Dave has shown repeatedly a true "can do" attitude as a services delivery provider for Oracle. He has proved himself time after time as a trusted advisor, a competent manager and a reliable member of our service team. I am sorry to see him leave Cognizant and wish him all the best in his new company.
